mapper.select: select p.userid,u.username,p.projectname,p.projecttype,p.location,p.time,p.money,p.lifeloan,p.ratemoney,p.appendix,p.aduitstate from projectapplication p,usertable u where u.userid=p.userid and p.aduitstate='1'
select p.projectname,o.outday,o.outmoney from outtime o,projectapplication p where o.projrctid=p.id
select f.projectid,p.projectname,f.firststatus,f.firstdate,f.firstname,f.firstremarks from firsttable f,projectapplication p where f.projectid=p.id
